Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar

Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker

Used also as fallback for automatic color

When in editor mode, medium press and drag a button to change its position or long press a button to show the edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.\n\nSetting a double tap action will delay single tap a bit.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed

The following quick tiles require unlocking before you can acccess them from lock screen: airplane, battery saver, bluetooth, cellular, data saver, nfc and wifi.

Jump to camera gesture is now disabled
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will skip music tracks

Don\'t show heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Show heads up only for dialer or messaging app
Apply a custom icon pack for Recents panel
You can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"icon pack\" and \"theme\" for ADW Launcher, Apex Launcher, GO Launcher, Launcher Pro or Nova Launcher.

Ambient Music Ticker shows playing music track info on the lock screen and ambient screen.

It's triggered also if Ambient Display is disabled when a new track is started, forcing a clean ambient screen with track info in the middle of the screen.

You can also double tap on the track info to skip to the next track.

If you own a Pixel (2nd generation and higher) and enable "Now Playing" and its notification in system Audio settings, Ambient Music Ticker will also work within it.
Show music ticker on lock screen
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
Block all headsup messages except calls
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Use default statusbar height in Hide

Configure Active Edge options, does not yet work with Smartbar or Fling
Trigger an action when the screen is off
Select an app to launch with the squeeze action
Not all squeeze actions within Active Edge have the capability to activate the display.\n\nLong press on apps in the Select App menu to show and choose a specific activity.
